As the sun dipped below the horizon, the town of Sweetvale experienced a phenomenon unlike any other—an ice-cream rain. Children rushed outside, arms wide open, as colorful scoops of strawberry, chocolate, and mint cascaded from the sky. Laughter echoed through the streets as they danced, catching the creamy drops on their tongues. The local ice-cream shop, once struggling, thrived as townsfolk gathered to scoop the fallen treats into cones. But amidst the joy, a mysterious figure appeared, holding an empty bowl. “I need your help,” he whispered, “to collect the flavors before they melt away forever.” The adventure began.
